author: daxian-dbw
body:
It resolves most of #1266. The 'Modules' item in #1266 will be analyzed and handled separately.

This PR mainly include following changes:
1. Add back missing files
2. Exclude certain .resx files for CoreCLR and FullCLR build
3. Add tests for TimeZone and FileCatalog

Note that the CoreCLR version of Test-Connection doesn't work in Win10 Home Edition, but works fine in Win10 Enterprise Edition. See #1303

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors can you please take a look?

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Are new test files, like `Get-TimeZone.Tests.ps1` copied from source depot or they brand new? If they copied, please use PS team as an author for them.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @JamesWTruher is working on an uber-PR to bring our existing tests. We need to give a heads-up to him, that you bring related tests in this PR

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
I disabled 3 FileCatalog tests because they fail on AppVeyor build VM (windows server 2012R2).
I opened #1299 to track the investigation of the failures.

title: Add back missing files for PowerShell Core
